publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1133 Colin Fox: May Day 2004 Edinburgh-That the Parliament wishes every success to the Edinburgh May Day committee and its 2004 celebrations to mark International Workers Day; notes that this year's theme is to commemorate the 20th anniversary of the 1984-85 miners' strike, and further notes that Arthur Scargill, former leader of the National Union of Miners, Tommy Sheridan MSP, Bill Speirs, General Secretary of the Scottish Trades Union Council, Hilary Wainwright, Editor of Red Pepper magazine and a Palestinian representative will lead the parade through the centre of Edinburgh on Saturday 1 May.

S2M-1133 Colin Fox: May Day 2004 Edinburgh-That the Parliament wishes every success to the Edinburgh May Day committee and its 2004 celebrations to mark International Workers Day; notes that this year's theme is to commemorate the 20th anniversary of the 1984-85 miners' strike, and further notes that Arthur Scargill, former leader of the National Union of Miners, Tommy Sheridan MSP, Bill Speirs, General Secretary of the Scottish Trades Union Council, Hilary Wainwright, Editor of Red Pepper magazine and a Palestinian representative will lead the parade through the centre of Edinburgh on Saturday 1 May.
S2M-1133 May Day 2004 Edinburgh (lodged on 31 March 2004) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1133 May Day 2004 Edinburgh (lodged on 31 March 2004) Elaine Smith*
